idea: The global defence drone industry is rapidly growing and expected to reach $26.12 bn by 2028. The solutions offered by today’s major drone companies are not inspired by flying animals and insects. Our bio-inspired drones built on cutting-edge technology will offer high-endurance-payload and high-altitude take-off to cater to futuristic aviation.
name: DroneVionics Pvt. Ltd.

idea: We at PIONEER CLEAN AMPS PRIVATE LIMITED are proposing to create software to help accident victims by providing an emergency support system. Through our software victims get their treatment as early as possible. Most of the people lose their lives by not getting proper treatment on time. And our software helps the accident victims to get their treatment on time.
name: PIONEER CLEAN AMPS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
GRAVITAS CARE PRIVATE LIMITED is a gradually growing private limited company started in the year 2022.
At Gravitas Care, we believe that everyone has some dream to achieve and they can do something special. But sometime due to lack of support it is not possible to achieve.
Are you an Enthusiastic woman looking for a opportunity of starting something from your home or are you already working at home? If yes, then your search ends here! Gravitas Care inviting passionate and ambitious women entrepreneurs to partner with us. Truly a golden opportunity for you! Gravitas Care work towards empowering women and will provide support, guidance and training to achieve your dreams. The biggest benefit is the flexibility that helps you to balance profession and home responsibilities.
Wherever you are in your career, we share the opportunity, resources, products and training to do amazing business. We believe that by bringing the right people, the right environment and the right way of doing things together, can achieve any things.

We envision an India “where every woman and every girl, who wants to earn, gets the opportunities to do so.”
We are on a mission to create an integrated ecosystem for women entrepreneurs, So they can build their own business and become contributors to the growth story of our country and their family. We are working towards empowering women and will provide support, guidance, products and training to achieve your dreams.

Gravitas Care support women with specific resources to their build business using you’re their skills! Women can start offering various products to their friends, neighbours, relatives and acquaintances. We will generate revenue and share with women. Women can order products at a factory price and sell to their customers at catalogue price. The revenue will also be generated to get their products notices which includes website, pay per click advertising, social media, Email marketing, Public relations, Content marketing, Traditional marketing through flyers and billboards.
name: GRAVITAS CARE PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: We are India's first cultivated seafood company. Winners of India Smart Protein Challenge 2021 organised by the Good food institute, we are trying to make seafood sustainable for generations to come by developing technology to produce seafood in a lab without killing any animals.

idea: We elevate new-age, homegrown and mission-driven brands by focusing on amplifying their voice and sharing their story on our platform. We connect young and upcoming D2C i.e., Direct to consumers brands to their target audience and help in cross-promotion between other like-minded brands to boost sales. We also offer a sophisticated yet easy-to-use interface for brands to conduct their business on our platform.
name: PREEBEE LIFESTYLE PRIVATE LIMITED
